Articles.Content:
Hello fellow engineers,

A friend and I have just started a modded DMP save with mostly just parts (B9, KW, Station Science and a couple of smaller part packs) and while we were building our space station we came across something. We wanted to have a nice big living compartment with with it's own IVA view, kinda like the Hitch Hiker storage container but bigger and for more kerbals with it's own interior. We did have one but the inside view looked a bit like a commercial airplane cabin.

I casually browsed curse and I didn't really find anything, so do people know of a mod that has this? (Or if they really want to go overboard and make it)

Btw I'm looking for .25

Thanks in advance

viccie211

Edited December 1, 2014 by viccie211

Check out Stockalike Space Station Parts. Nertea, the creator, is still working on the IVAs but what he has so far is very nice:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91814-0-25-Stockalike-Station-Parts-Expansion-%2817-11-2014-CTT-compatibility%29

Porkjet's Habitat Pack, which focuses on inflatables, has some nice IVAs:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64442-Habitat-Pack

Not sure if this works in 0.25, but have also look at the Hollow Parts mod:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29031-0-23-5-Hollow-Structures-Hulls-(Updated-2014-04-09)
Thanks guys, I will try them out, it looks awesome!
